message.body: Text me your plan and eta!
Ps. No pressure! Were you able to get my dad's ticket refunded?

How are you?? Not sure yet what time I arrive, will know more when on the road and will keep u posted. I don't want to interfere with ur routine, I can meet u at playhouse. What's good for you? Do u have things to do before play? Rehearse? I see play is sold out. I prefer to get there early so I can get a good seat. Don't worry about your dads ticket. I think it's non refundable. But if u know somebody who needs it, let me know. See you soon! Yeah!
Ok, let me know when you're close. I can meet you anytime and we'll make plans together. Please be careful! Love ya, can't wait to see you!
Are u here? I'm rehearsing, I'll be out in 20!

Just got home. In driveway. The play was wonderful!! I overheard a guy said that he feels guilty and should have paid 200 per ticket. Another lady said it was better then broadway!!! I agree! You were fantastic. Im so happy I went. Have fun!
Thank u so much for coming!!! <3!

Loved every minute. Except I really wanted to stay. I just got into bed now. If I stayed, I would have gotten home too late.and be too tired. it was harder in the dark. I even made a wrong turn, that cost me a half hour longer. But, I'm home now safe. Enjoy the rest of the shows. Keep me posted. I'm curious if the local paper is going to have reviews. Just a great show!!
I didn't see the people from the restaurant. So, they weren't kyle parents!!
Whew! They weren't! Thanks again for coming, glad u got home safely. Love ya!
